name: BMM_FEATURE_GROUP
documentation: A logical group of features, with a name and set of properties that applies to the group.

name.name: name
name.documentation: Name of this feature group; defaults to 'feature'.

properties.name: properties
properties.documentation: Set of properties of this group, represented as name/value pairs. These are understood to apply logically to all of the features contained within the group.

features.name: features
features.documentation: Set of features in this group.

visibility.name: visibility
visibility.documentation: Optional visibility to apply to all features in this group.
